post.body: wat u got planned 4 tonight man??
ooo new site looks flash man
gotta get on the hunt for a good live synth player, little phatty anybody??
6 hrs on the boat 2day , worked out most of my plans for 09 startin wiv play more live music, gotta dig out the rs7000 http://bit.ly/3LJHbr
just started gettin in to the resolutions for 09, first is to play live more often, 08's been hard core studio time and we gots2 get it out
just checkin shook mags freddie hubbard obit http://bit.ly/DCXs
just got an amazing money scam email from an orphan, the best one I've read so far, they could make a living as a writer of soaps
need to break from all the "how to" music industry stuff 4 a week, lookin for good writing resources, new blog launches in 09
crusin the rss while my 3yr old snaps the world on his digital camera, 160 shots on xmas day including the new profile shot, kids view
damn it tweet too soon, sp2 won't install and the stores closed hhmmmm
after 2 days of weird pc probs just found that the techs didnt do the xpsp2 upgrade, penny drops, jump on the download, we have audio woomp
RT @DPROS: Super Viral Brothers Flu shot mixtape out of sweden http://tinyurl.com/89xvyf super fresh mix, u gotta grab it
headin to a private doco screening of Robert M Knight - rock photographer http://bit.ly/15h9X rock gods 4 xmas
ok it's finally time to tidy the studio, out with the old shit, busted computers, vinyl back in the crates, cd's in cases and mags on shelvs
just checkin my old EP from The Ghostfaders on last.fm http://bit.ly/9mrg0 get it free and hold on for the follow up next month
really diggin some of these AIR apps for designers http://bit.ly/5KU6
scannin the RSS and still chillin on a break, gonna hit the studio tonight and start on the beats for the EP mix project, phat or crusty?
just updating the blog, havin troublewith twitter tools, weird formatting, maybe it's my theme, damn it!
back to earth from xmas island, coffe and bagels, donating the old toys to charity and making room for the new toys, thanks nanny
avin a sweet pre xmas avo with stevie wonder, shuggie O, Gil scott and jazzanova, it's all about the songs today
